Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Delphia/Gregory
ShortDescription: #81W West Lawrence buses are rerouted via Bryn Mawr, East River Road, The Pavilion, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Delphia/Gregory.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Bryn Mawr, East River Road, The Pavilion, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Delphia/Gregory.

Allow extra travel time.
